metadata.title: CVE-2022-23132 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: During Zabbix installation from RPM, DAC_OVERRIDE SELinux capability is inuse to access PID files in [/var/run/zabbix] folder. In this case, ZabbixProxy or Server processes can bypass file read, write and executepermissions check on the file system level

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
